text:
Coursera | Mountain View, CA. on-site

Coursera is hiring!

We are looking for frontend, backend, and mobile engineers to join our team. We use scala/play, react, cassandra, and other technologies across our stack.

Solving online education is really challenging and rewarding, especially as you are able to see people's lives transform because of what we do.

https://www.coursera.org/about/careers
